
.. _tlscacertificatesv1:

TLS CA Certificates Management (v1)
-----------------------------------

Organisational access to the various resources in Jitsuin Archivist
can be managed by defined TLS CA certificates.

The contents of the PEM file is stored together with a display name and a 
unique id.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   upload
   retrieval
   deletion
   update
   openapi
